entry.title: WIND WARNING, Stavely
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:50 a.m. MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High 15.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
